resume: The Stooges are inept janitors who stencil the wrong occupation names on the doors of their office building. As a result, their janitors' room is labeled as belonging to Omay, a famous interior decorator. Mrs. Smirch , who wants to hire Omay to redecorate her house, mistakes Moe for the real Omay, having just heard him so identify himself—only because he is trying to teach pig Latin to Curly. The Stooges agree to do the job and proceed to make a mess of Mrs. Smirch's house.
